summary: REQ-12 appears addressed via a new RemoteImage component with minimum height, loading/error handling, and a specific placeholder for Google Images search URLs. However, REQ-13 is not implemented because exportDeckToPptx.ts still generates and downloads an HTML file, not a real .pptx. REQ-14 is also not implemented because the export success toast still instructs HTML/Print-to-PDF/screenshot workflows and does not reflect a true PPTX download flow.

missing_requirements.requirement: Replace the current HTML-based export in frontend/src/pptx/exportDeckToPptx.ts with generation of a real PowerPoint .pptx file download, embedding slide text and assigned images, preserving minimal white + blue styling and 16:9 layout.
missing_requirements.reason: The export function still generates HTML (generateSlidesHTML), creates a Blob of type text/html, and downloads a .html file (Kisan_Sahayak_Presentation.html). No evidence in the diff summary shows PPTX file generation or embedding images into a PPTX.

missing_requirements.requirement: Update the export UI messaging to reflect the real PPTX download flow (no HTML/PDF/screenshot references) and provide clear English success/error/warning toasts matching actual export behavior and image-embed limitations.
missing_requirements.reason: The success toast explicitly references exporting an HTML file and instructs Print to PDF / import into PowerPoint / screenshots, which contradicts the required real PPTX download messaging.

hallucinated_features.description: Bulk multi-image upload mapper that auto-assigns uploads to slides 2–11 in a specific order, plus related store support for bulk image setting.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest focuses on fixing preview visibility and delivering true PPTX export + messaging. Bulk image upload mapping is not requested by REQ-12/13/14.

hallucinated_features.description: Expanded per-slide image upload support for slides 2–11 (beyond only slide 11).
hallucinated_features.reason: Not part of REQ-12/13/14; the request only requires preview visibility fixes and PPTX export/messaging updates.
